title: rp code from amazon not working?
body: I bought a $10 RP card from amazon and got emailed the code right, not sure why but it doesnt work keeps saying its invalid did i get screwed or is their a problem with the client or something?

replies.body: You may get two separate emails, one which is your Order Number and another with the actual code.  If you're unable to redeem it, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can help out.  We'll respond asap to get that RP on the account!
